subject: Order status
description_text:
Ssn5168 order number hasnt been shipped yet and i paid for express shipping. I want a refund on the shipping as it has been over 1 week and still hasnt arrived or a cancel on my haptics order
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Jeremy darrow,    We apologize for the inconvenience. The haptics have been out of stock for nearly two weeksâ€”they're incredibly popular. We'll ship yours out within the next couple of days.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047195599488
